Job Description: About the Job:   Cloud Operations Team Lead  Cloud Operations is a global organization at EagleView. Your tasks will center around maintaining the health of the cloud engineers and completing assigned projects and tasks. Work will center around the support and build-out of product-driven AWS enterprise solutions. Present services include ECS, EFS, EC2, ELB, ECS, VPC, IAM, RDS, Kinesis, Lambda, CloudWatch, CloudFormation, etc.    Your team is also responsible for the operations and optimization of the majority of AWS assets for the company. Applicable backgrounds may derive from scalable cloud implementations, networking, security, system administration of linux and windows, CI/CD, monitoring, and storage. There will be design and architecture discussions and you will partake and contribute to these.    Ideal candidate:   Skills/Requirements Our ideal candidate is one who is passionate about their career and has proven success with what they do. As a member of an agile team, you'll participate in all aspects of software development lifecycle.    You must be able to work well in a highly collaborative setting and have the mindset for finding creative and innovative solutions to the complex challenges facing our team. The person hired will have the opportunity to work closely with our machine learning technologies, image and geospatial data while developing and maintaining a scalable computing system.    Skills & Requirements:   1-3 years management or team lead experience  5-8 years experience with AWS on scalable platforms  Experience with continuous delivery  2-3 years experience with containers  5+ years programming experience (Python, Ruby, etc)  Exposure to incorporating infosec principles into your infrastructure practices.  Experience with Linux shell and Windows PowerShell.  Graduate or Undergraduate degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Computer Engineering.  High sense of ownership and self reliance.  Highly collaborative with strong verbal/written communication, documentation skills.
